name: Jlm resume
body:
Summary
I am a junior developer familiar with the fundamentals of MVC and BDD, and constantly pursuing my passion to continuously learn new languages, frameworks and techniques in order to become a better computer programmer. I have always been drawn to tech in all its forms, and over the last year, I've dabbled in many different programming languages and web development platforms. What really excites me about programming is the near-constant sense of working on an elaborate puzzle, and the great satisfaction that comes when all the pieces fit together and the final picture appears.

Check out my code projects by clicking the link below to my GitHub account.
(The picture was automatically added by LinkedIn by scraping my GitHub profile pic... I'm not actually that vain.)

Experience

Junior Developer
iNatural Corporation
Nov 2014 - April 2015 â€“ (16 months)
Tan Commercial Building Osmena St., Brgy 2, Tangub City

Write excellent code.
Collaborate with other members of the Development team.
Learn new technologies.

Australian Veterinary Association

STI College - Ozamis

Projects:

Ruaven(Link)

This is my first app using ActiveAdmin and is intended to explore customizing ActiveAdmin. The administration portal allows administrators basic CRUD functionality as well as the ability to charge users via the Stripe API and keep track of people via the Pipeline Deals API.

AVA Calendar Listing(Link)
AVA Event Registration(Link)
Fresh2Market Salesforce Application(Link)

Tic Tac Toe(Link)
July 2014
I used HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery to build my own version of the popular game.
